name: Blackhole Shuffle Board.io
description:
In love with action puzzle game? Then welcome aboard...!!!

Swipe your finger, drag on this challenging board and clear the puzzle with perfection. Get the hole and finite the challenge. Try again & again and enjoy the game and win the challenges.

Main Features:

Amazing graphics.
Realistic physics.
Smooth and responsive gameplay.
Different difficulty levels.
Choose your hockey puck skin.
